title: Cote D'Azur Oceanfront Escape Just 30 Minutes from Marseille with Daily Breakfast
description:
Situated in the heart of the French Riviera, this swanky seaside retreat is the epitome of Provençal chic and your ticket to living 'la vie en blue'. Kick back in stylish rooms inspired by the French seaside, then head to the rooftop infinity pool for a refreshing dip, or discover spa treatments more refreshing than a dive in the Mediterranean.

Step out into the postcard-perfect town of Carry-le-Rouet - stroll along to the picturesque port as fishermen bring in the fresh catch of the day, hop on a boat for a sun-soaked adventure or for nature lovers, the rugged beauty of the Calanques National Park is right on your doorstep. Then tuck in for a dinner of French seafood at Restaurant L'Oursin and a nightcap at the hotel's jazzy bar, named for Nina Simone.
offer_address: 1 Boulevard des Moulins, Carry le Rouet 13620, France
